texto: to provide the organization with necessary human resources and to maintain their competencies, consistent with business needs. This process provides a supply of skilled and experienced personnel qualified to perform life cycle processes to achieve organization, project, and stakeholder objectives. 6.2.4.2 Outcomes As a result of the successful implementation of the Human Resource Management process: a) Skills required by projects are identified. b) Necessary human resources are provided to projects. c) Skills of personnel are developed, maintained or enhanced. d) Conflicts in multi‐project resource demands are resolved. 33 © ISO/IEC 2017 – All rights reserved © IEEE 2017 – All rights
